what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: goal bbsTaiwan streamline Taiwan Breeding Birds Survey (BBS) data retrieval analysis. support data retrieval GBIF, Taiwan BBS data stored. ‘bbsTrim’ also include population trend modelling, using TRIM (TRends Indices Monitoring data). Users can tailor species analysis, controlling data stratification, preparation, modeling. goal expand Taiwan BBS data access broader R-society Taiwan.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Package installation: can install development version bbsTaiwan GitHub : Data download: can retrieve Taiwan Breeding Birds Survey data GBIF dataset. visiting site, use Download > Source archive option downloading.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
code: library(bbsTaiwan)  # looked up the species of interest  bbs_translate("山紅頭") bbs_translate("金翼白眉")  # subset the GBIF data to the species of interest bird_data <- bbs_subset(folder = "PATH_TO_GBIF_FOLDER",                         from = 2009,                         to = 2015,                         species_list = c())  # visualize the species distribution  bird_map <- bbs_visualization(data = bird_data)
